abilities.name: Blight Bombardment
abilities.rule: At the start of your Shooting phase, select one enemy unit within 30" of and visible to this model. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly **DEATH GUARD** model makes a ranged attack that targets that unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 (if that attack is made with a Blast weapon, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead).

abilities.name: Virulent Aura
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.
